alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 11:25AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bay, southeastern Walton and southwestern Washington Counties through 1115 AM CDT... At 1024 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles southeast of Santa Rosa Beach to 7 miles southwest of Panama City Beach to 22 miles southwest of Tyndall Air Force Base. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Ebro, St Andrews State Park, Seminole Hills, Gulf Resort Beach, West Panama City, Bahama Beach, Biltmore Beach, Sunnyside, Bunker, Vicksburg, West Bay, Inlet Beach, Gulf Lagoon Beach, Magnolia Beach, Bruce, Red Head and Pine Log. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; South Walton
